ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c, "Horizon"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Horizon Fully-Insured", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Horizon FEP", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Call Request", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Horizon SHBP",Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Screener")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Group/Plan Sponsor must be Horizon Fully-Insured, Horizon FEP, or Horizon SHBP
